faqData.question: Who can use SALi Fund?
faqData.answer: SALi Fund is currently focused on supporting children and students in Sierra Leone who are facing health challenges and financial constraints.

faqData.question: How is SALi Fund different from other crowdfunding platforms?
faqData.answer: SALi Fund is specifically designed for the Sierra Leonean context, with features like local payment integration, blockchain transparency, and AI health assistance tailored to the unique healthcare needs of the region.

faqData.question: How does SALi Fund ensure the transparency of donations?
faqData.answer: SALi Fund uses blockchain technology to track and verify every donation, ensuring that funds are transparently and securely allocated to the intended recipients.

faqData.question: Can donors from outside Sierra Leone contribute?
faqData.answer: Yes, donors from around the world can contribute using blockchain or international payment options, making it easy to support health initiatives in Sierra Leone.

faqData.question: How does the AI assistant help users?
faqData.answer: The AI assistant guides users through the platform, helping them find the right specialists, understand medical conditions, and manage healthcare expenses effectively.

start_campaign_steps.head: Create an Account
start_campaign_steps.body: Sign up for a new account on the SALi Fund platform using your email or phone number.

start_campaign_steps.head: Setup Payment Method
start_campaign_steps.body: In your profile settings, add a preferred payment method for receiving funds.

start_campaign_steps.head: Start a New Campaign
start_campaign_steps.body: From the navigation menu, click on the plus button to begin creating a new campaign.

start_campaign_steps.head: Enter Campaign Details
start_campaign_steps.body: Set your target amount, create a compelling title, and write a detailed description of your cause.

start_campaign_steps.head: Preview Campaign
start_campaign_steps.body: Review how your campaign will appear to potential donors before finalizing.

start_campaign_steps.head: Save or Publish
start_campaign_steps.body: Choose to save your campaign as a draft for later editing or publish it immediately.

start_campaign_steps.head: Receive Funds
start_campaign_steps.body: As donations come in, track your progress and receive funds through your chosen payment method.

star_steps: Medical Funding and Specialist Access: Our immediate goal is to connect children and students in Sierra Leone with the financial support they need for medical treatment and to access health specialists, ensuring no one is deprived of essential care due to economic barriers.
Mental Health Support: Once we establish medical funding, we'll expand to provide mental health resources, offering support and professional help for those struggling with mental health issues.
Support for FGM Victims: We aim to address the issue of Female Genital Mutilation (FGM) by connecting victims with professional help, raising awareness, and offering care to those affected.

tile_scroll_list.head: Power through, even when the going gets tough
tile_scroll_list.body: We help you spot and work around whatever stands in the way, be it bad habits, fears, etc.

tile_scroll_list.head: Learn more about who you are and where you want to go
tile_scroll_list.body: We ask the right questions to help you better understand why you do things the way you do.

tile_scroll_list.head: Play and grow together with others on the same journey
tile_scroll_list.body: Ahead feels like a game, not like a chore. See yourself grow every day towards achieving your goals!

tile_scroll_list.head: Master how to make it happen in real life
tile_scroll_list.body: We support you towards ninja-level skills with sleek tools such as dry-runs, quizzes, and flashcards.

tile_scroll_list.head: Learn about practical skills that you can actually use in real life
tile_scroll_list.body: We teach you smart psychological techniques and habit-forming strategies that are easy to apply.

tile_scroll_list.head: Get support that's made for your needs
tile_scroll_list.body: We build your personal roadmap of lessons and actions towards your goals.
